General.Name: Ecoslops SA
General.Description: Ecoslops S.A. regenerates oil residues into new fuels and light bitumen in France and Portugal. It is involved in the supply of slops and sludges. The company also sells refined products, including gasoline, naphtha, diesel, and fuel oil, and light bitumen; provides port services; and sells industrial equipment. In addition, it offers solutions to port infrastructure, waste collectors, and ship owners. Ecoslops S.A. was incorporated in 2009 and is based in Paris, France.

6.Name: Mr. Pedro  Simões
6.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Ecoslops Portugal SA
